subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Fencing (Sport)
Women
Gold
Basketball
Soccer
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — Three American fencers swept the women’s sabre finals on Saturday, winning the first three medals of the Olympics for the United States and at least temporarily investing this little-known sport, introduced to the Olympics in 2004, with some Errol Flynn-like glamour.
